nodes.text: N6-BC was a astromech droid who served the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. In 3640 BBY, the droid was stationed on the planet Ilum, during the battle that took place there. On Ilum the droid operated a stall in the Republic base camp, from which it sold various weapon modifications. N6-BC had red plating and yellow sensors.

N6-BC appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Mods Vendor for Republic players on Ilum. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, N6-BC was removed from the game along with the rest of the Mods Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games.
